name: REDACTED
description: REDACTED is an action-packed zombie survival game with an emphasis on narrative, unique gameplay experiences, and atmosphere. Anything not nailed down can be used to your advantage as you survive against the zombie horde in this mysterious facility. Check out the merchant to stock up on supplies or buy new weapons. Survive for as long as you can against increasingly difficult waves of undead in survival mode. Try out onslaught mode if you want to test yourself against the ultimate challenge.
